name: Mystery Tales 2: The Spirit Mask
overview: Time traveller setting Gripping story revolving around the mysterious Spirit Mask 30 huge ( 3x3 DS screens) levels around the world and time. Venice Carnival, Tibetain Buddist Monastery, Japanese Zen Gardens, Transylvanian Hunting Castle etc. Intereactive levels : break pots , raise heavy objects, use various items on the levels 8 minigames and 8 magic spell
